name: Primitive Shooter
description: Primitive Shooter - an interesting and exciting game, made in a minimalist style! Take on the role of the main character, shoot out from enemies, set new records and all this under pleasant music!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, 7 Processor: Intel Core 2 duo + Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP, 7 Processor: Intel Core i3 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 2 GB DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
